article_title: A look at Gaza's current humanitarian situation.
sentence: More  than  33,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  the  conflict,  which  began  after  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  1,200  Israelis  and  taking  about  250  hostage  -  around  130  of  them  remain  unaccounted  for  and  at  least  34  of  them  are  presumed  dead.

article_title: A look at Gaza's current humanitarian situation.
sentence: The  UN  continues  to  warn  that  famine  is  imminent  in  northern  Gaza,  where  seven  aid  workers  were  killed  by  an  Israeli  strike  earlier  this  month  -  leading  US  President  Joe  Biden  to  warn  Israeli  PM  Benjamin  Netanyahu  that  more  needed  to  be  done  to  protect  Palestinian  civilians  and  aid  workers  during  the  conflict.

article_title: A look at Gaza's current humanitarian situation.
sentence: Still,  aid  agencies  maintain  that  not  enough  supplies  can  reach  civilians  -  and  at  least  27  children  have  died  as  a  result  of  malnutrition  since  October,  according  to  the  World  Health  Organization.
